name: Together (Pre-alpha Playtests)
description:
This is a multiplayer online survival game.

Press V to voice chat.

Grab slimes and put them in corrals to farm mana.

Craft mana bombs to explode bases.

Join the discord

This is a multiplayer online survival game.
You go around in the woods chopping trees, mining ore and  meeting other players.
You use those resources to build bases with friends,  forge weapons and raid your enemies.

You can farm slimes and plants in your base. Put the slimes in corrals so they can produce mana balls.

Mana balls are a valuable resource, you can exchange it for coins or use it to craft mana bombs. 

Mana bombs can destroy base buildings so you can loot what's inside.
